```{r}
data("knz_bison")
```

```{r}
knz_bison
```

```{r}
knz_bison <- knz_bison %>%
  mutate(age = rec_year - animal_yob)
```

```{r}
filter_bison_by_weight <- function(weight_threshold) {
  knz_bison %>%
    filter(animal_weight > weight_threshold)
}
```

```{r}
bison_clean <- knz_bison %>%
  drop_na(animal_weight, animal_sex)

ggplot(bison_clean, aes(x = animal_sex, y = animal_weight, fill = animal_sex)) +
  geom_boxplot() +
  labs(
    title = "Bison Weight Distribution by Sex",
    x = "Bison Sex",
    y = "Bison Weight"
  )
```
